group_1.textLeft: Yes, Leila!
I want you to represent us on the@battlefield!
What?
O-oh, oh right! Sorry!
I was in such a hurry I forgot to explain.
B-basically, it's like this!
An event is being held at the Mizutoku Strip@Mall to promote the area...
They're going to hold a cooking competition@during it.
They asked our restaurant to attend the@competition as a guest...
And I accepted their invitation...
But you see! The same day that the contest@is being held...
A very important customer from when my dad@was in charge booked the whole restaurant...
I absolutely have to be there to help!
[chara:300902:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I can't go...
But you see, I already said...
[chara:300902:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]"Our restaurant will really get the crowds@to go wild!"
And other over-the-top promises like that...
But my dad said that reservations take@top priority...

group_1.textRight: So the customer booked the whole place?@Must be someone really important...

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* I don't know what I'm going to say@to the event staff.
There's no way I'll be able to make up for@everything I promised...
Or so I thought. That's where you come in!
Yes, yes I do!
I want you to compete in my place!

group_1.textRight: [chara:301301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]No way, no how, no no no! There's no way I@could pull that off!
I'm just an amateur, especially when it comes@to cooking meals...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, but this competition is...
A sweets contest!
And I'd like you to make the cake we baked@today!
The cake you made... It tasted just as@good as one we would make here!
[chara:300902:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]So you see? There's no problem! You can@definitely handle the competition!
And you could represent us there...
So if you competed for us, it'd help us out@sooo much!
Please!
